fields.description: Industry or profession of business or individual. Go to Allowed Entity Scopes response section to see all the possible values.
fields.label: Entity Scope

fields.description: Primary key of the base document. This value is a local primary key, meaning, it's only unique within a user object. Different user objects can have same base doc IDs.
fields.label: Entity ID

fields.description: Type of business or gender of the individual. Go to Allowed Entity Types response section to see all the possible values.
fields.label: Entity Type

fields.description: Included for an individual's base document (either for business, joint or individual accounts). Value ranges from 0-1. Go to ID Score to learn more.
fields.label: ID Score

fields.description: If unchecked, base document wont participate in user permission decisioning. Default is checked.
fields.label: Is Active

fields.description: Name of the individual/entity associated with this base document.
fields.label: Name

fields.description: Permission scope of the base document.
fields.label: Permission Scope

fields.description: Physical documents linked to the base document.
fields.label: Physical Docs

fields.description:
Documents required to decision a flagged user. 
Separated by comma
fields.label: Required EDD Docs

fields.description: Social documents linked to the base document. More details below.
fields.label: Social Docs

fields.description: Included for an individual's base document (either for business, joint or individual accounts).
fields.label: Trust Level

fields.description: Virtual documents linked to the base document. More details below.
fields.label: Virtual Docs
Watchlists
fields.options:
PENDING
SOFT_MATCH|PENDING_MATCH
MATCH
SOFT_MATCH
NO_MATCH
FALSE_POSITIVE

fields.description: Address city of the business location or individual's residence. If the user wishes to receive mail elsewhere, you can add that as a MAILING_ADDRESS social document. Go to Social Document Schema to learn more. We recommend verifying your address to prevent failure.
fields.label: Address City

fields.description: ISO Alpha-2 formatted Address country code of the business location or individual's residence.
fields.label: Address Country Code

fields.description: Address zip/postal code of the business location or individual's residence.
fields.label: Address Postal Code

fields.description: Address subdivision (state) of the business location or individual's residence.
fields.label: Address Subdivision

fields.description: Common name for the individual/entity.
fields.label: Alias (Optional)

fields.description: Day of entity formation for business or Birth date for individual.
fields.label: Day

fields.description: Month of entity formation for business or Birth month for individual.
fields.label: Month

fields.description: Year of entity formation for business or Birth year for individual.
fields.label: Year

fields.description: Desired scope for base document. Go to Intro to Spec Sheet to learn more.
fields.label: Desired Scope

fields.description: The key of the document you intend to submit. Go to Intro to Spec Sheet to learn more.
fields.label: Doc Option Key

fields.description: The key of the document option you intend to submit. Go to Intro to Spec Sheet to learn more.
fields.label: Docs Key

fields.description: The title of the document option you intend to submit. Go to Intro to Spec Sheet to learn more.
fields.label: Docs Title

fields.description: Included for business user's business base document. Possible values: VALID, INVALID, REVIEWING. Go to KYC, Risk and Compliance to learn more.
fields.label: Edd Status

fields.description: Email of the individual/entity associated with this base document.
fields.label: Email

fields.description: Required if individual base doc on business user
fields.label: Entity Relationship

fields.description: IP of the individual/entity associated with this base document.
fields.label: Ip

fields.description: Maiden name of the individual. Helpful to provide this in instances where the individual's maiden name is still associated with their TIN/SSN.
fields.label: Maiden Name

fields.description:
Required if individual base doc on business user.
Percentage of the business owned by the beneficial owner.
fields.label: Ownership Percentage

fields.description: Phone number of the individual/entity associated with this base document.
fields.label: Phone Number

fields.description:
Required if individual base doc on business user.
Title of the beneficial owner.
fields.label: Title
